mg_types.h
1 /*
2  * MG_types.h
3  *
4  * Created on: Jun 13, 2013
5  * Author: tgil
6  */
7 
8 #ifndef MG_TYPES_H_
9 #define MG_TYPES_H_
10 
11 #include <hwpl.h>
12 
13 #define MG_MAX (32767)
14 #define MG_MIN (-32768)
15 
16 enum {
17  MG_LINE,
18  MG_ARC,
19  MG_RECT,
20  MG_TRIANGLE,
21  MG_TYPE_TOTAL
22 };
23 
24 #define MG_TYPE_MASK (0xFF)
25 #define MG_ENABLE_FLAG (1<<15)
26 #define MG_FILL_FLAG (1<<14)
27 
28 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
29  int16_t start;
30  int16_t end;
31 } mg_arc2_t;
32 
33 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
34  int16_t todo;
35 } mg_triangle_t;
36 
37 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
38  int16_t x, y;
39 } mg_point_t;
40 
41 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
42  uint16_t w, h;
43 } mg_dim_t;
44 
45 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
46  uint16_t type; //type of primitive object
47  int16_t rotation; //vector space rotation
48  mg_point_t shift;
49  mg_dim_t dim; //vector space size
50  union {
51  mg_arc2_t arc;
52  mg_triangle_t triangle;
53  } primitive;
54 } mg_t;
55 
56 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
57  //list of points
58 
59 } mg_poly_t;
60 
61 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
62  //list of points
63  mg_point_t center;
64  uint16_t inner, outer; //inner/outer radii
65  int16_t start, stop; //start/stop angles
66 } mg_arc_t;
67 
68 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
69  mg_point_t shift; //shift within screen (absolute)
70  int16_t rotation; //rotate within screen (absolute)
71  mg_dim_t size;
72 } mg_map_t;
73 
74 #endif /* MG_TYPES_H_ */
